welcome.title: Welcome to Angus Scenario!
welcome.description: Here you and your team can complete the following work:
features: Scenarios can help orchestrate more complex requirements or user stories, compared to single-step test cases, scenarios can contain more steps and processes.
Add, edit, and debug scenarios online;
Manage my scenarios and test tasks;
Conduct scenario functional testing, stability and performance testing to ensure delivery of stable systems that meet performance indicator requirements.

directory.description: Directories are used to organize test scenarios or group test scenarios with similar characteristics, which can be project names or module names, etc. Maximum support for 3 levels, each directory's permissions are independent.

scenario.description: Add and edit test scenarios online; the system provides HTTP and WebSocket protocol scenario orchestration by default, other protocols or middleware need to enter
scenario.executionDescription: After scenario orchestration and "execution configuration" is completed, you can execute functional, performance testing, and stability testing on scenarios

tips.dynamicValues: To make parameter values in scenarios closer to real business data, the system also provides two dynamic value methods, you can choose parameter value methods according to your business needs.
tips.confirmDeleteWithChildren: Deleting 【{name}】 will delete its subdirectories and scenarios, please confirm whether to delete?
tips.confirmDeleteWithFiles: {name} directory contains sub-files, are you sure to delete them together?
tips.confirmDeleteScenario: Deleting scenario will synchronously delete associated follows, favorites, metrics, variables and other information, please confirm whether to delete?
tips.performanceMetricsWarning: Execution will judge whether test results pass based on set performance metrics; please modify configuration carefully.
